response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. The product we have to offer is not just any item; it holds immense value and potential for growth. We believe its worth to you is $800,000, which aligns perfectly with our expectations. Considering the unique attributes and benefits this product provides, I am extending an offer to purchase it from us at $950,000. This price reflects our commitment to ensuring a fair transaction while maximizing our return on investment. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of working together to unlock the full potential of this remarkable product.", "product_price": 950000}
